description.The Hybrid Curse: *A spell performed by Esther, at the request of Mikael, to suppress the werewolf aspect in Niklaus.
description.The Sacrifice (event): * A ritual used to break a curse that suppresses the werewolf aspect in a hybrid.
description.The Immortality Spell: *A spell granting individuals the ability to live forever.
description.The Sacrifice of Twelve Hybrids: *One of the sacrifices needed to complete the Expression Triangle
